title: Pulsefire Skin Concepts for J4 + Vayne
body: I reckon these two skins {{champion:59}} and {{champion:67}}  can really give riot a lot of profit if they considered making these two skins as they can be considered ultimate or just legendary skins :p cheaper for us whichever, i don't think it will change the fact that we will buy these skins no matter what, anyways glhf on the rift fellow summoners ;]
